descriptionHtml:
[font=AR DESTINE][size=6]LATEST CHANGE[/size][/font]

[size=5]Linghting change for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54362/?]Somber 3 ENB[/url].[/size]

[font=AR DESTINE][size=6]NEXT CHANGE[/size][/font]

[font=AR DESTINE][size=6]DESCRIPTION[/size][/font]

[size=3]Add to SKYRIM.
Room for screen shot.
Magic for come and go.[/size]

[font=AR DESTINE][size=6]HOW TO USE[/size][/font]

[size=3]1.Type "PLAYER.ADDSPELL XX000d93" to console.
2.Type "PLAYER.ADDSPELL XX000d95" to console.
3.Go.[/size]

[font=AR DESTINE][size=6]RECOMMENDED MODS LIST[/size][/font]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45807/?][size=3]NobleSkyrimMod HD-2K[/size][/url](LATEST FILE)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54362/?][size=3]Somber 3 ENB[/size][/url]
[size=3]2k~4k Resolution Map Retexture Mod[/size]

[size=3]Thank you for good works![/size]

[font=AR DESTINE][size=6]TWITTER[Japanese][/size][/font]

author: Nfghjk
